headline: EDWARDS HELIUM LEAK DETECTOR
description: Helium Leak Detector    Edwards Spectron 5000 Specify primary voltage 200VAC; 220VAC or 240VAC when ordering, please
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Helium Leak Detectors
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model Spectron 5000
High Vacuum Pump Type Diffusion Pump
Roughing Pump Capacity 418.21 l/m (14.80 CFM)
Test Port Connection KF 40
Interface RS 232
Audio Alarm with Variable Pitch Yes
Internal Calibrated Leak Included
Built-In Roughing Pump Included
Liquid Nitrogen Trap Included
Accessories One detector available with E2M30 pump $21,195.00
Other Information Part no: L18310030
CE Label
Detectable leak:
  • Massive: 9x10-2 to 1x10-4 mbar
  • Gross: 9x10-1 to 3x10-9 mbar
  • Fine: 9x10-3 to 2x10-11 mbar
Power Requirements 200-240 V 13.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1999
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Depth 29.000 in (73.7 cm)
Height 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Weight 419 lb (190 kg)
